title: Signal Integrity - RF Integrity Engineer
summary: Do you like to work on groundbreaking technologies that enable amazing new products? We are looking for a hardworking and hard-working RF Integrity Engineer for Apple's IC Packaging team.
description:
- Conduct 2D/3D EM simulations on design optimization and coupling mitigation for IC, packages and boards.
- Enhance EM modeling and analysis methodology to achieve accurate correlation between simulation and measurement at various levels.
- Design high performance RF components, such as transmission line, filter, matching network, in various technologies.
- Collaborate with IC, package, and product teams to address spur/desense issues in simulation and lab environment.
key_qualifications:
- BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience.
- Excellent problem solving skills in a dynamic and complex environment when boundary is not clearly defined.
- Strong fundamentals in microwave engineering and 2D/3D EM simulation tools.
- Deep knowledge on interaction between EM model and other circuit structures.
- Familiar with RF impairment at block and transceiver levels, including amplifier, filter, PLL, etc.
- Experience with RF lab equipment, such as VNA, signal generator, spectrum analyzer, real-time scope, probe station, etc.
- Enthusiasm in learning new technology and willingness to take risks to solve problems.
- Strong academic training and knowledge on fundamentals of SI and PI issues is a plus.
- Familiar with RFIC design and simulation flow is preferred
- Experience in advanced transceiver design and integration is a plus
- RF system modeling and link budgeting for transceiver chains.
- Preferred experience on RF module/board development.
education_experience: - BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience.
